mapper.select: SELECT tb1.*,b.articleLoveNum ,c.timeArticleLoveNum,d.timeComNum ,e.timeVisNum,f.visNum,g.articleCommentStatus from ( (SELECT a.*, IFNULL(la.status,0) articleLoveStatus,COUNT(c.comId) comNum from article a LEFT JOIN love_article la on la.articleId=a.articleId LEFT JOIN comment c on c.articleId=a.articleId where a.articleId=#{param1} ) tb1, (SELECT COUNT(la.articleId) articleLoveNum from article a LEFT JOIN love_article la on la.articleId= a.articleId where a.articleId=#{param1} and la.status=1 ) b, (SELECT COUNT(la.articleId) timeArticleLoveNum from article a LEFT JOIN love_article la on la.articleId= a.articleId where a.articleId=#{param1} and la.status=1 and la.updateTime >= now()-interval 15 day )c, (select COUNT(comId) timeComNum from comment where articleId=#{param1} and createTime >= now()-interval 15 day)d, (select COUNT(visitorId) timeVisNum from visitor where articleId=#{param1} and createTime >= now()-interval 15 day)e, (select COUNT(visitorId) visNum from visitor where articleId=#{param1} and createTime >= now()-interval 15 day)f, (SELECT IFNULL((SELECT IFNULL(c.articleId,0) from collection c where c.articleId=#{param1} and c.userId=#{param2} and c.`status`=1),0) articleCommentStatus)g)
